pages.text: koraa, ‘ma'i kerala ahira dbaraahe tomalokaka satarka karao’; kintu yisakala badhira sihamtaka yetiya satarka karaa haya tetiya sihamte se'i ahbana nusune
Arau tomara pratipalakara sastira akanamano yadi sihamtaka sparsa karae tente arasye sihamte kai uthiba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara, niscaya ami yalima achilo

arau kiyamatara dina ami n'yayabicarara tulacani sthapana karaima, seye karao prati kono dharanara an'yaya karaa naha’ba arau amala yadi sasya dana paraimana ojanarao haya tathapi'o ami seya upasthita karaima; arau hicapa grahanakarairaupe amiye'i yathesta
Arasye ami mucha arau haraunaka dana karaichilo phurakbana, yito muttakbisakalara babe jyoti arau upadesa
yisakale nedekhakaiye te'omlokara pratipalakaka bhaya karae arau te'omloke kiyamata samparke bhita-santrasta
Arau e'ito haiche barakatamaya upadesa, yito ami aratirna karaicho. Tathapi'o tomaloke iyaka asbikara karaibane
arau ami iyara agata ibraahimaka subhabud'dhi arau sathika jnana dana karaichilo arau ami te'omra bisaye achilo samyaka paraijnata
Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka ka’le, ‘e'i murtibora ki, yiborara pujata tomaloka asakta haicha!’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pitr-purausasakalaka e'iborara ibadata karaote dekhicho’
Te'om ka’le, ‘arasye tomaloke arau tomalokara pitr-purausasakale'o spasta bibhraantita acha’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amara ocarata satya lai ahicha neki, ne tumi amara lagata dhemali karaicha
te'om ka’le, ‘baram tomalokara raba se'ijane'i yijana akasasamuha arau prthiraira raba, yiye e'ibora srsti karaiche, arau e'i bisaye ma'i an'yatama saksi’
‘Arau allahara sapata! Tomaloke guci yoraara pichata ma'i tomalokara murtiborara bisaye arasye kausala aralambana karaima’
